conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Umm, hi. I-I need a disguise, can you help me?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Of course, what kind of disguise are you looking for?

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: I-I don't know. Something that will make me look completely different.

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Hmm, let's see... I could dress you up as a nobleman, a commoner, a scholar, a merchant... Oh! I know, a mysterious traveler. That could be interesting.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: I-I don't know, I feel embarrassed. I'm not sure I could pull it off.

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Don't worry, I'll help you pick out the perfect disguise. Trust me, you'll look great.
